name: William Wheat
text: Very nice place, from Montgomery and needed a meeting, felt very welcomed

name: Marcus Carter
text: JAFI is a one of a kind sobriety haven created as a nonprofit clubhouse back in the seventies by a group of AA members who wanted to sign a lease basically but didnt want to break AA non outside entity traditions. Over the years it has grown into a steadfast southside sanctuary for anyone looking to stay sober reguardless of D.O.C. . JAFI now provides space for AA, HA, CA and CMA meetings as well as a place to hang out during the day for JAFI members who pay a nominal monthly fee to keep the place operational. JAFI occupies a strange but unique place in the hearts and minds of hundreds of folks from all walks of life who found serenity in sobriety in Birmingham.

name: Klutch Bucket
text: Best meeting house in birmingham in my opinion.

name: Jamie Contreras
text: Husband was here a few times in the last 5 years very nice place wonderful staff ! Changed his life the last night of going 😊

name: Susan Vandergriff
text: They seemed like they truly cared like they do want to make me better.. praise God!!!!!

name: Derron Wilson
text: Great place. Friendly ppl. Helped me get on the path to sobriety.
